[[Image:VMware Workstation 6 running ubuntu.png|260px|right|thumb|[[VMware Workstation]] running [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]], on Windows, an example of the use of an ''Hypervisor'']]
In [[computing]], a '''hypervisor''' (also: '''virtual machine monitor''') is a [[virtualization]] platform that allows multiple [[operating system]]s to run on a host computer at the same time.
In [[computing]], a '''hypervisor''' (also: '''virtual machine monitor''') is a [[virtualization]] platform that allows multiple [[operating system]]s to run on a host computer at the same time.
